install.name: Bible Study Search
install.author: Tom Fuller - JoomlaBibleStudy
install.description: Joomla Bible Study System plugin that adds searching of Bible studies to standard Joomla search of site.

param.name: search_limit
param.label: Search Limit
param.description: Number of Search items to return

param.name: show_description
param.label: Hide/Show Description
param.description: Choose whether to hide or show the description on the search results page

param.name: set_title
param.label: Choose Title
param.description: Choose whether the book or the study title is first
